Plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.
Title: Ghostbusters
Actors: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis
tomatoConsensus: An infectiously fun blend of special effects and comedy, with Bill Murray's hilarious deadpan performance leading a cast of great comic turns.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 6 nominations.
